name: ARTEL
overview: ARTEL, Inc. provides information technology and telecom solutions. It offers managed network services, such as strategic planning, satellite, earth terminal, systems and network integration support, network monitoring and control, acquisition/asset management support, emergency/contingency planning, and network security/encryption. The company also provides systems and solution integration services, including technology assessments benchmarking, enterprise resource planning, enterprise application integration, open system migration and legacy systems management/migration, acquisition management support, systems security integration and implementation, operations/end user support, and help desk support/hosting, as well as system prototyping and application development services; and database management, data mining, and data warehousing services. In addition, it offers information assurance/homeland security services, such as security planning, emergency, disaster recovery and restoration planning, enterprise security architecture design engineering, intrusion detection, incident handling/response and recovery, systems certification and accreditation, security training and awareness support, national security emergency preparedness planning, and homeland security planning. Further, the company provides e-government and e-commerce solutions, including business modeling and technical reference model development, secure Internet/intranet/Extranet architecture design, electronic commerce/electronic data interchange, Web-enabled application development and implementation, awareness and education, portal infrastructure operations and management, and online content management services, as well as Web portal design, development, and implementation services. ARTEL, Inc. was founded in 1986 and is based in Reston, Virginia with locations in the Middle East, Africa, Europe, and the United States.

milestones.description: ARTEL Acquired by TPG Growth and Torch Hill Investment Partners
milestones.source_description: ARTEL Acquired by TPG Growth and Torch Hill Investment Partners
